Paragraph: We have created two deletion mutations in mice to understand PWS and the mechanism of this IC .

1. Prader-Willi Syndrome (PWS) - a genetic disorder characterized by hypotonia, developmental delays, short stature, and insatiable appetite leading to obesity. It is caused by deletions or mutations in specific genes located on chromosome 15.
